Step 1: Prepare the links

  1. Upload the images and their thumbnails to the external service of your choice and get the URLs of both.
    IMPORTANT!: Make sure you get the link to the actual image file and not a web page.
  2. Make two lists in plain text, one for the thumbnail URLs, the other for the URLs of the original images. Each URL should be on a new line. Do not separate the URLs by any punctuation (like comma, full-stop)
    IMPORTANT!: the URLs of the thumnails and original images should be in the same order
